issue.title: [CF 1130] Unit Cooldown Timer Reset (if condition passes)
issue.body:
Possible to make SPECIFIC conditions that would reset the timer of the tracked unit cooldown?

Ex. grounding totem is 25s, but if you reset it w/Call of the Elements, it'll make it available again instantly.
Ex. evasion is 60s, but can be reset w/Preparation

So on so forth


> Posted by CurseForge user Jalopyy | Imported from CurseForge issue #1130 | Raw

comments.body:
These already exist, but haven't been updated very well.

https://github.com/ascott18/TellMeWhen/blob/master/Components/IconTypes/IconType_unitcooldown/unitcooldown.lua#L129
